Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES

Title: Relates to the payment of shelter and rent arrears
Summary: Relates to the payment of shelter and rent arrears; provides that all shelter arrears payments authorized for applicants to receive an emergency grant to pay for rent, property taxes or mortgage arrears shall be limited to once every year unless the district determines at its discretion that additional shelter arrears payments are necessary based on the individual circumstances.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the payment of shelter and rent arrears
